mapper.select:
select id,`Name` name,`Job` job,`Office` office,`Mobile` mobile,`ShortMobile` shortMobile, `Landline` landline,`ShortLandline` shortLandline,`QQ` qq,number from addressbook.addrlist
Name like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Job like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Office like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Mobile like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
ShortMobile like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Landline like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
ShortLandline concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
QQ like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
number like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
limit #{map.offset}, #{map.limit}

select count(*) from addressbook.addrlist
Name like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Job like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Office like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Mobile like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
ShortMobile like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
Landline like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
ShortLandline concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
QQ like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
number like concat('%',#{map.name},'%')
